issue.title: [Python] UnboundLocalError in ParquetDatasetPiece
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-900](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-900). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `read()` method called with no arguments produces an UnboundLocalError.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-900?focusedCommentId=15986911) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 607
